com.communote.server.web.api.to.listitem

Class DetailPostListItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.api.core.common.IdentifiableEntityData
      • com.communote.server.web.api.to.listitem.CommonPostListItem
        • com.communote.server.web.api.to.listitem.DetailPostListItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DetailPostListItem
extends CommonPostListItem
implements Serializable
    List item describing a note that should be used by the old API in versions prior to 1.0.1
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
